price: Inform My slaves that I am indeed the All-Forgiving, the Most Merciful,
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
